content: विचर् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To wander about, roam over (<ab>oft.</ab> with <ab>acc.</ab>); इष्टान्देशान् विचर जलद <ls>Me. 115</ls>; विचचार दावं <ls>R. 2. 8</ls>; <ls>Ku. 3. 31.</ls> {@--2@} To do, perform, practise. {@--3@} To act, deal, behave. {@--4@} To deviate from the right path, go about wantonly; <ls>Ms. 9. 20.</ls> {@--5@} To pass through, pervade. {@--6@} To attack, march against. {@--7@} To associate or have intercourse with. {@--8@} To go badly, fail. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To think, reflect or meditate upon. {@--2@} To discuss, call in question, debate; आज्ञा गुरूणां ह्यविचारणीया <ls>R. 14. 46.</ls> {@--3@} To calculate, estimate; take into account, consider; परेषामात्मनश्चैव यो विचार्य बलाबलं <ls>Pt. 3</ls>; सुविचार्य यत्कृतं <ls>H. 1. 22.</ls> {@--4@} To hesitate, doubt. {@--5@} To examine, investigate. {@--6@} To seduce.
